data.caption: General Updates
data.news_body: DPSC Limited has informed the Exchange about General Updates

data.descriptor: Certificate under SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations, 2018
data.caption: Certificate under SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations, 2018
data.news_body: DPSC Limited has informed the Exchange about Certificate under SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations, 2018

data.caption: Updates
data.news_body: DPSC Limited has informed the Exchange regarding 'website of India Power Corporation Limited (formerly DPSC Limited) i.e. www.indiapower.com is updated and functional as per Regulations 46 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015'.

data.caption: Resignation
data.news_body: DPSC Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Resignation of Mr Sanjeev Sinha as Other of the company w.e.f. January 31, 2026.

data.caption: Trading Window
data.news_body: DPSC Limited has informed the Exchange regarding the Trading Window closure pursuant to SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015

data.caption: Appointment
data.news_body: DPSC Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Appointment of Mr NAVEEN PRAKASH as Non- Executive Independent Director of the company w.e.f. January 01, 2026.

data.caption: General Updates
data.news_body: DPSC Limited has informed the Exchange about General Updates  regarding 100 Days Campaign    Saksham Niveshak

data.caption: Updates
data.news_body: DPSC Limited has informed the Exchange regarding 'website of India Power Corporation Limited (formerly DPSC Limited) i.e. www.indiapower.com is updated and functional as per Regulations 46'.
